articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: American Airlines extends suspension of alcohol services following Southwest flight attendant assault - CNN
articles.description: American Airlines has joined Southwest Airlines in suspending alcohol services on flights, the airline said Saturday. The decision follows a recent assault of a Southwest flight attendant that resulted in a serious injury.
articles.content: New York (CNN Business)American Airlines has joined Southwest Airlines(LUV) in suspending alcohol services on flights, the airline said Saturday. The decision follows a recent assault of a Southwest … [+3052 chars]

articles.author: Morgan Phillips
articles.title: Biden calls Texas voting bill ‘wrong and un-American’ - Fox News
articles.description: President Biden called a new Texas voting overhaul finalized by state Republicans an “assault on democracy.”
articles.content:
